alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 8:36PM EDT until May 09 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin...Michigan... Menominee River near McAllister affecting Marinette and Menominee Counties. Menominee River near Florence affecting Dickinson, Iron and Florence Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wolf River near Shiocton affecting Waupaca, Outagamie and Shawano Counties. For the Menominee River...including Twin Falls Dam-Iron Mountain, Florence, Vulcan, Niagara, Pembine, Menominee River at White Rapids Dam, Koss, McAllister...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Lower Wolf River...including Shiocton, New London, Lake Poygan...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near Florence. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding is confined to lowland and wooded land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CDT Tuesday was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 9.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning to 8.4 feet early Friday afternoon. It will rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to 9.2 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage again Monday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon.
